en-US.summary: Show the succulent of the day from the British Cactus and Succulent Society
examplePhrases: Alexa open the succulent of the day
Alexa tell succulent of the day to show me a succulent
Alexa ask succulent of the day for a plant
en-US.name: succulent-of-the-day
en-US.description: Gives you the latest information about the latest succulents from the British Cactus and Succulent Society.
